amendment.description: To encourage and ensure the use of safe equestrian helmets, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4092 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4092 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S1693-1696) To encourage and ensure the use of safe equestrian helmets, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4092 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4092 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Dodd.
